statement.name: INSERT_SMANMV
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMANMV (NRONMV, TPONMV, CODNMV, AGNNMV, NROPRS, NROKRG, STDNMV, VLRNMV, NROWRK, FCHNMV, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMANMV
statement.sql: UPDATE SMANMV SET CODNMV=?, AGNNMV=?, STDNMV=?, VLRNMV=? WHERE NRONMV=?
